ComicInfo.Summary:
Betrayal and heartache await Sheena as she wakes to find herself captured by the vicious head of Cadwell Industries. To her horror, she’s not the only one taken captive! With no weapons to defend herself and no chance of escape, Sheena is forced to make a terrible choice–to save one friend’s life at the expense of another.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ A | Cover A | Maria Sanapo & Ceci de la Cruz | 1 | B | Cover B | Jan Duursema & Sian Mandrake | 2 | C | Cover C | Gisele Lagace | 3 | D | Cosplay Cover D | Photo | 4 | E/RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Maria Sanapo | 5 | F/RI | 1:20 Retailer Incentive "Black & White" Edition Variant Cover | Jan Duursema | 6 | G/RI | 1:25 Retailer Incentive "Virgin Art" Edition Variant Cover | Gisele Lagace | 7 |
